means: 拥挤(congest的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: He first promised two weeks ago to clear Britain's congested roads.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在两周前首次承诺解决英国道路拥堵的问题。

sentence.Network_en: The arteries in his neck had become fatally congested.
sentence.Network_cn: 他颈动脉栓塞，危在旦夕。

sentence.Network_en: Many of Europe's airports are heavily congested.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲许多机场都十分拥挤。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... congenial adj. 意气相投的 congested adj. 拥挤的 congregate v. 聚集.
pulsate的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ...  congested 拥挤的, 堵塞的 ... atelier 工作室, 画室.
雅思与托福常考词汇必备 ... connection n. 连接;关系 congested a. 拥挤不堪的;充塞的 congratulate vt. 祝贺.

list.abs: 拥塞避免（Congestion Avoidance）：专门设计用于丢弃分组，以达到避免拥塞的目的。拥塞避免的概念是基于TCP操作的。
拥塞控制(Congestion Control) — A mechanism to prevent a TCP sender from overwhelming the network.流控制(Flow Control) — A m.
拥塞窗口(congestion window)是发送端根据网络拥塞情况得出的窗口值，是来自发送端的流量控制。 (8-1)式表明，发送端的发送窗口 …
在加拿大如何治感冒 ... Headache 头痛 Nasal Congestion 鼻塞 Sneezing 打喷嚏.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent : past participle of congest, from Latin congest- 'heaped up', from the verb congerere, from con- 'together' + gerere 'bring'

entry.tran: （道路或区域）交通阻塞的，拥堵的
entry.def: A congested road or area is extremely crowded and blocked with traffic or people.

example.ex: He first promised two weeks ago to clear Britain's congested roads...
example.tran: 他在两周前首次承诺解决英国道路拥堵的问题。

example.ex: Some areas are congested with both cars and people.
example.tran: 有些地方挤满了车和人。

entry.tran: (身体部位)堵塞的，充血的，淤血的
entry.def: If a part of the body is congested, it is blocked.

example.ex: The arteries in his neck had become fatally congested.
example.tran: 他颈动脉栓塞，危在旦夕。

auth_sentence.content: Our skies are the most congested in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our skies are the most congested in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our skies are the most congested in the world.

auth_sentence.content: It would rival Chicago because Chicago is so congested now.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would rival Chicago because Chicago is so congested now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would rival Chicago because Chicago is so congested now.

auth_sentence.content: Building up instead of out made the neighborhood less congested.
auth_sentence.res_content: Building up instead of out made the neighborhood less congested.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Building up instead of out made the neighborhood less congested.

sentences.en: The city streets were congested with vehicles.
The roads to Bordeaux were heavily congested.
sentences.cn: 通往波尔多的道路非常拥挤。

sentences.en: Wangfujing Street is always very congested.
sentences.cn: 王府井大街总是非常拥挤。

sentences.en: His lungs seem to be congested.
sentences.cn: 他的两肺似乎有充血现象。
